title: Is We Dumb? | Candy Nipples. Ricochet. White Tiger. You Deaf?
description:
Did you go to a daycare that was directly next to two massive tigers that the neighbors thought was totally cool? Let's talk about that,  a grown man being WAY too aggressive towards a child in a movie theatre, drones delivering some tasty treats,  anonymously buying a guitar for a kid, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?! 

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/PiMOfrevd2k

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
